:v-model.description: Enter the initial value of the field

bg-color.description: The background color of the input box and button
bg-color.description_zh: 输入框和按钮的背景颜色

min.description: The minimum value that can be entered by the user

max.description: The maximum value that can be entered by the user

step.description: Step size, each addition or subtraction, from 1.4.5 onwards, support decimal values, if you need decimals, please set positive-integer to false
step.description_zh: 步长，每次加或减的值，1.4.5起支持小数值，如需小数，请设置positive-integer为false

disabled.description: Whether to disable the operation, after disabling, you cannot add, subtract, or manually modify the value of the input box
disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用操作，禁用后无法加减或手动修改输入框的值

size.description: Input box text and button font size, unit: rpx
size.description_zh: 输入框文字和按钮字体大小，单位rpx

color.description: The color of the input box text and the plus or minus button icons
color.description_zh: 输入框文字和加减按钮图标的颜色

input-width.description: Enter the width of the box, in rpx

input-height.description: Enter the height of the box and button, in rpx
input-height.description_zh: 输入框和按钮的高度，单位rpx

index.description: Event callbacks are used to distinguish which input box is currently changing
index.description_zh: 事件回调时用以区分当前发生变化的是哪个输入框

disabled-input.description: Whether to prohibit manual entry of values in the input box
disabled-input.description_zh: 是否禁止输入框手动输入值

cursor-spacing.description: Specify the distance between the cursor and the keyboard to avoid the keyboard blocking the input box, in rpx
cursor-spacing.description_zh: 指定光标于键盘的距离，避免键盘遮挡输入框，单位rpx

long-press.description: Whether to turn on long press to increase or decrement continuously
long-press.description_zh: 是否开启长按连续递增或递减

press-time.description: After the trigger is turned on by pressing and holding the press, how long does it take for each trigger, in ms
press-time.description_zh: 开启长按触发后，每触发一次需要多久，单位ms

positive-integer.description: Whether you can enter only positive integers
